paths

Class Bezier

  • java.lang.Object
    • paths.Path
      • paths.Bezier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPath

    public class Bezier
extends Path
    A Bezier curve defined by two anchor points and two control points.
    Author:
    James Morrow

      • Bezier

        public Bezier(float ax1,
              float ay1,
              float cx1,
              float cy1,
              float cx2,
              float cy2,
              float ax2,
              float ay2)
        Parameters:
        ax1 - the x-coordinate of the 1st anchor point
        ay1 - the y-coordinate of the 1st anchor point
        cx1 - the x-coordinate of the 1st control point
        cy1 - the y-coordinate of the 1st control point
        cx2 - the x-coordinate of the 2nd control point
        cy2 - the y-coordinate of the 2nd control point
        ax2 - the x-coordinate of the 2nd anchor point
        ay2 - the y-coordinate of the 2nd anchor point

      • translate

        public void translate(float dx,
                      float dy)
        Description copied from interface: IPath
        Shifts this Path dx units in the x-direction and dy units in the y-direction.
        Parameters:
        dx - The number of pixels to shift the path right.
        dy - THe number of pixels to shift the path down.
